data.eml:eml: Three new species of the genus Clubiona from China (Araneae: Clubionidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Liu, Ping, Yan, Heng-Mei, Griswold, Charles, Ubick, Darrell (2007): Three new species of the genus Clubiona from China (Araneae: Clubionidae). Zootaxa 1456: 63-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.176349
